channel.title: CVE Feed for LCDS - Leão Consultoria e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas Ltda ME -- LAquis SCADA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LCDS - Leão Consultoria e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas Ltda ME -- LAquis SCADA

item.title: CVE-2018-17893|2024-09-17T03:13:47.712Z -- lcds%20-%20le%C3%A3o%20consultoria%20e%20desenvolvimento%20de%20sistemas%20ltda%20me -- laquis%20scada
item.description: LAquis SCADA Versions 4.1.0.3870 and prior has an untrusted pointer dereference vulnerability, which may allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-17899|2024-09-17T00:45:27.781Z -- lcds%20-%20le%C3%A3o%20consultoria%20e%20desenvolvimento%20de%20sistemas%20ltda%20me -- laquis%20scada
item.description: LAquis SCADA Versions 4.1.0.3870 and prior has a path traversal vulnerability, which may allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-17895|2024-09-17T02:52:22.745Z -- lcds%20-%20le%C3%A3o%20consultoria%20e%20desenvolvimento%20de%20sistemas%20ltda%20me -- laquis%20scada
item.description: LAquis SCADA Versions 4.1.0.3870 and prior has several out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities, which may allow remote code execution.
